name: Barista
0:
”Alexa ask barista sage What is the recipe for a Flat White”
”Alexa ask barista sage what are the steps to make a latte?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: barista sage
des: An Alexa skill for home baristas. It helps you quickly look up recipes for different beverage types while you're busy making delicious drinks.
